languages.text: "Больше не к кому!" {n}— горестно восклицает чиновник.{/n} "Все гости — мерзавцы, или душегубы, или пройдохи. Либо же мерзавцы, душегубы и пройдохи одновременно! Я хотел послать сервитора, но сегодня на площадке — только личные {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}сервиторы{/g} дома Беллардо, у меня нет кода доступа к ним. Остаетесь только вы! А по вам сразу видно — {mf|мужчина|женщина} солидн{mf|ый|ая}... И очень героического вида! Увидел вас и сразу понял — вот кто протянет руку помощи!"

"There's no one else to turn to!" {n}The clerk exclaims in dismay.{/n} "All the guests here are scoundrels, murderers, or crooks — or all three at once! I was going to send in a {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, but only personal servitors of House Bellardo are allowed into the courtyard today, and I don't have their access codes. You're all I have left! And I can tell you're an upstanding individual... with a most noble countenance, too! The moment I saw you, I knew — {mf|he|she} is the one who will save me!"
languages.original_text: "Больше не к кому!" {n}— горестно восклицает чиновник.{/n} "Все гости — мерзавцы, или душегубы, или пройдохи. Либо же мерзавцы, душегубы и пройдохи одновременно! Я хотел послать сервитора, но сегодня на площадке — только личные {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}сервиторы{/g} дома Беллардо, у меня нет кода доступа к ним. Остаетесь только вы! А по вам сразу видно — {mf|мужчина|женщина} солидн{mf|ый|ая}... И очень героического вида! Увидел вас и сразу понял — вот кто протянет руку помощи!"

traits.locale_text: "There's no one else to turn to!" {n}the clerk exclaims in dismay.{/n} "All the guests here are scoundrels, murderers, or crooks — or all three at once! I was going to send in a Servitor, but only personal Servitors of House Bellardo are allowed into the courtyard today, and I don't have their access codes. You're all I have left! And I can tell you're a reputable individual... And you have a very heroic countenance! The moment I saw you, I knew — {mf|he|she} is the one who will give me a helping hand!"

I was going to send in a Servitor, but only personal Servitors of House Bellardo are allowed into the courtyard today, and I don't have their access codes. You're all I have left! "There's no one else to turn to!" {n}The clerk exclaims in dismay.{/n} "All the guests here are scoundrels, murderers, or crooks — or all three at once! I was going to send in a {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, but only personal servitors of House Bellardo are allowed into the courtyard today, and I don't have their access codes. You're all I have left! And I can tell you're an upstanding individual... with a most noble countenance, too! The moment I saw you, I knew — {mf|he|she} is the one who will save me!"

languages.text: “因为根本没有别人能帮我！”{n}这位文员沮丧地感叹道。{/n}“这里所有的宾客都是无赖、骗子或杀人犯，或者三者都是！我本打算派我的{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}机仆{/g}来做这件事情，但今天只有贝拉多家族的私人机仆能进来，而且我也没有大门的密码。我只能求您帮帮我了！我看得出来，您是个正直的人……而且您的举止也像个贵族！当我看到您的那一刻起，我就意识到，您就是那个可以救我一命的人！”
languages.original_text: "There's no one else to turn to!" {n}The clerk exclaims in dismay.{/n} "All the guests here are scoundrels, murderers, or crooks — or all three at once! I was going to send in a {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, but only personal servitors of House Bellardo are allowed into the courtyard today, and I don't have their access codes. You're all I have left! And I can tell you're an upstanding individual... with a most noble countenance, too! The moment I saw you, I knew — {mf|he|she} is the one who will save me!"

traits.locale_text: “因为根本没有别人能帮我！”{n}这位文员沮丧地感叹道。{/n}“这里所有的宾客都是无赖、骗子或杀人犯，或者三者都是！我本打算派我的{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}奴工{/g}来做这件事情，但今天只有贝拉多家族的私人奴工能进来，而且我也没有大门的密码。我只能求您帮帮我了！我看得出来，您是个正直的人……而且您的举止也像个贵族！当我看到您的那一刻起，我就意识到，您就是那个可以救我一命的人！”

languages.text: «¡No puedo acudir a nadie más!». {n}El funcionario grita, desesperado.{/n} «Los otros invitados son rufianes, asesinos o criminales, ¡o las tres cosas! Iba a enviar un {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servidor{/g}, pero hoy solo los servidores de la casa Bellardo pueden entrar al patio y no tengo los códigos de acceso. ¡Usted es mi última oportunidad! Además, salta a la vista que es una persona ejemplar, ¡y de porte noble! ¡En cuanto le vi, supe que sería {mf|el|la} que me sacaría de este apuro!».
languages.original_text: "There's no one else to turn to!" {n}The clerk exclaims in dismay.{/n} "All the guests here are scoundrels, murderers, or crooks — or all three at once! I was going to send in a {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, but only personal servitors of House Bellardo are allowed into the courtyard today, and I don't have their access codes. You're all I have left! And I can tell you're an upstanding individual... with a most noble countenance, too! The moment I saw you, I knew — {mf|he|she} is the one who will save me!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No puedo acudir a nadie más!». {n}El funcionario grita, desesperado.{/n} «Los otros invitados son rufianes, asesinos o criminales, ¡o las tres cosas! Iba a enviar un {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servidor{/g}, pero hoy solo los servidores de la casa Bellardo pueden entrar al patio y no tengo los códigos de acceso. ¡Usted es mi última oportunidad! Además, salta a la vista que es una persona ejemplar, ¡y de porte noble! ¡En cuanto le vi, supe que sería {mf|el|la} que me sacaría de este apuro!».

languages.text: 「他に頼める人がいないからですよ！」{n}職員は呆れたように叫んだ。{/n}「ここにいる客は悪党か殺人犯かペテン師か、あるいはその3つすべてが揃った者たちしかいません！{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}サーヴィター{/g}を送ろうと思いましたが、本日はベラルド家に直接仕えるサーヴィターしか中庭に入れませんし、私はアクセスコードを持っていません。あなたにしか頼めないんです！あなたは正直な御方ですし…気品ある顔立ちをしています！あなたを見た瞬間にわかりました―私を救ってくれるのはこの方しかいないと！」
languages.original_text: "There's no one else to turn to!" {n}The clerk exclaims in dismay.{/n} "All the guests here are scoundrels, murderers, or crooks — or all three at once! I was going to send in a {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, but only personal servitors of House Bellardo are allowed into the courtyard today, and I don't have their access codes. You're all I have left! And I can tell you're an upstanding individual... with a most noble countenance, too! The moment I saw you, I knew — {mf|he|she} is the one who will save me!"

traits.locale_text: 「他に頼める人がいないからですよ！」{n}職員は呆れたように叫んだ。{/n}「ここにいる客は悪党か殺人犯かペテン師か、あるいはその3つすべてが揃った者たちしかいません！{g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}サーヴィター{/g}を送ろうと思いましたが、本日はベラルド家に直接仕えるサーヴィターしか中庭に入れませんし、私はアクセスコードを持っていません。あなたにしか頼めないんです！あなたは正直な御方ですし…気品ある顔立ちをしています！あなたを見た瞬間にわかりました―私を救ってくれるのはこの方しかいないと！」

languages.text: "Es gibt niemand anderen!", {n}ruft der Angestellte bestürzt aus.{/n} "Alle Gäste hier sind Schurken, Mörder oder Gauner – oder alles drei auf einmal! Ich wollte einen {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitor{/g} hineinschicken, aber heute dürfen nur persönliche Servitoren des Hauses Bellardo den Hof betreten, und ich habe deren Zugangscodes nicht. Ihr seid meine einzige Hoffnung! Und man sieht gleich, das Ihr ein aufrechtes Individuum seid ... noch dazu mit einem überaus edlen Auftreten! Als ich Euch sah, wusste ich sofort – {mf|er|sie} wird mich retten!"
languages.original_text: "There's no one else to turn to!" {n}The clerk exclaims in dismay.{/n} "All the guests here are scoundrels, murderers, or crooks — or all three at once! I was going to send in a {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, but only personal servitors of House Bellardo are allowed into the courtyard today, and I don't have their access codes. You're all I have left! And I can tell you're an upstanding individual... with a most noble countenance, too! The moment I saw you, I knew — {mf|he|she} is the one who will save me!"

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt niemand anderen!", {n}ruft der Angestellte bestürzt aus.{/n} "Alle Gäste hier sind Schurken, Mörder oder Gauner – oder alles drei auf einmal! Ich wollte einen {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}Servitor{/g} hineinschicken, aber heute dürfen nur persönliche Servitoren des Hauses Bellardo den Hof betreten, und ich habe deren Zugangscodes nicht. Ihr seid meine einzige Hoffnung! Und man sieht gleich, das Ihr ein aufrechtes Individuum seid ... noch dazu mit einem überaus edlen Auftreten! Als ich Euch sah, wusste ich sofort – {mf|er|sie} wird mich retten!"

languages.text: « Je ne peux demander à personne d'autre ! {n}s'exclame le greffier avec désarroi.{/n} Les invités ne sont qu'une bande de scélérats, d'assassins ou d'escrocs... quand ils ne sont pas les trois en même temps ! Je comptais envoyer un {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, mais seuls les servitors personnels de la maison Bellardo sont autorisés dans la cour aujourd'hui, et je ne connais pas leurs codes d'accès. Vous êtes mon seul espoir ! J'ai tout de suite vu que vous étiez quelqu'un d'intègre... et de noble contenance ! Dès l'instant où mes yeux se sont posés sur vous, j'ai su que vous étiez {mf|le seul|la seule} à pouvoir me sauver ! »
languages.original_text: "There's no one else to turn to!" {n}The clerk exclaims in dismay.{/n} "All the guests here are scoundrels, murderers, or crooks — or all three at once! I was going to send in a {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, but only personal servitors of House Bellardo are allowed into the courtyard today, and I don't have their access codes. You're all I have left! And I can tell you're an upstanding individual... with a most noble countenance, too! The moment I saw you, I knew — {mf|he|she} is the one who will save me!"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne peux demander à personne d'autre ! {n}s'exclame le greffier avec désarroi.{/n} Les invités ne sont qu'une bande de scélérats, d'assassins ou d'escrocs... quand ils ne sont pas les trois en même temps ! Je comptais envoyer un {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, mais seuls les servitors personnels de la maison Bellardo sont autorisés dans la cour aujourd'hui, et je ne connais pas leurs codes d'accès. Vous êtes mon seul espoir ! J'ai tout de suite vu que vous étiez quelqu'un d'intègre... et de noble contenance ! Dès l'instant où mes yeux se sont posés sur vous, j'ai su que vous étiez {mf|le seul|la seule} à pouvoir me sauver ! »

languages.text: "Güvenebileceğim başka kimse yok!" {n}Kâtip, ümitsizlikle haykırıyor.{/n} "Buradaki misafirlerin hepsi ya hain ya katil ya da dolandırıcı. Hatta üçü birden! Aslında {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}hizmetör{/g} yollayacaktım ama bugün avluya sadece Bellardo Hanesi'nin kişisel hizmetörleri alınıyor, ben de erişim kodlarını bilmiyorum. Tek çarem sizsiniz! Dürüst biri olduğunuz her hâlinizden belli, ayrıca soylu bir simanız var! Gördüğüm an anladım, beni kurtaracak kişi işte bu {mf|adam|kadın} dedim!"
languages.original_text: "There's no one else to turn to!" {n}The clerk exclaims in dismay.{/n} "All the guests here are scoundrels, murderers, or crooks — or all three at once! I was going to send in a {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitor{/g}, but only personal servitors of House Bellardo are allowed into the courtyard today, and I don't have their access codes. You're all I have left! And I can tell you're an upstanding individual... with a most noble countenance, too! The moment I saw you, I knew — {mf|he|she} is the one who will save me!"

traits.locale_text: "Güvenebileceğim başka kimse yok!" {n}Kâtip ümitsizlik içinde haykırıyor.{/n} "Buradaki misafirlerin hepsi hain, katil, dolandırıcı ya da üçü bir arada! Bir {g|Encyclopedia:Servitor}servitör{/g} yollayacaktım ama bugün avluya sadece Bellardo Hanesi'nin kişisel servitörleri alınıyor ve erişim kodlarını bilmiyorum. Tek çarem sizsiniz! Sizin saygın biri olduğunuzu görebiliyorum, ayrıca soylu bir simanız var! Gördüğüm anda anladım, beni kurtaracak kişi işte bu {mf|adam|kadın} dedim!"
